mapper.select: select chat_no as chatNo, chat_send as chatSend, chat_receive as chatReceive, chat_content as chatContent, chat_date as chatDate from chat where chat_receive = #{sessionMemberNo} or chat_send = #{sessionMemberNo} order by chat_no

select cc.chat_no as chatNo, cc.chat_send as chatSend, cc.chat_receive as chatReceive, cc.chat_content as chatContent, cc.chat_date as chatDate, m.member_nickname as memberNickname from (select max(chat_no) as chat_no, chat_send from chat group by chat_send) c join chat cc on c.chat_no = cc.chat_no join member m on cc.chat_send = m.member_no where cc.chat_receive=#{sessionMemberNo} order by cc.chat_no desc

select c.chat_no as chatNo, c.chat_send as chatSend, c.chat_receive as chatReceive, c.chat_content as chatContent, c.chat_date as chatDate, m.member_nickname as memberNickname from chat c join member m on m.member_no = c.chat_send or m.member_no = c.chat_receive where (c.chat_receive = #{chatReceive} or c.chat_send = #{chatReceive}) and m.member_nickname=#{memberNickname} order by chat_no
